response.original_title: 40 ans de bêtisiers Le grand classement
response.overview: It's time to review the funniest moments of the year, and beyond! For the first time in France, the channel asked French people to choose their favorite excerpt, drawing from 4 decades of television archives. Uncontrolled skids, blunders and falls, stuttering, uncontrollable guests… The ranking designates the winners, category by category. On set, the stars take turns to comment on the images: Jamel Debbouze, Vincent Lagaf, Stéphane Bern, Eric Antoine, Michel Drucker, Stéphane Plaza, Pierre Palmade, Estelle Denis, Michel Boujenah.
response.title: 40 ans de bêtisiers Le grand classement
